name: Tubby Tabby
description:
Navigate via rolling in a penthouse apartment as an adorable kitty with the goal of destruction. Increase your chances of that goal by finding the hidden mice!

Controls:

WASD – Rolling Movement

SPACE - Jump/Rapid Spin

Mouse Collect – Simply roll over the mice to pick them up
